event_summary: The Annual Benefit Auction is held the first Saturday in May to support the preservation of the Nicholas Stoltzfus Homestead, educational programs, and operating expenses [[9]](http://www.nicholasstoltzfus.com/04_auction.html). [[1]](https://www.experienceberks.com/event/annual-benefit-auction-%26-gathering/7425/) Other upcoming events include a Berks County Amish Historical Tour on March 28, 2026, and October 24, 2026, as well as a Schmucker/Smucker/Smoker Reunion on July 17-18, 2026 [[4]](http://www.nicholasstoltzfus.com/).

evidence_date: The 2026 Annual Scholarship Golf Outing will be held on Friday, September 11, 2026 at Honeybrook Golf Club. [[1]](https://mountjoychamber.com/events/golf-outing/)
evidence_auction: We are looking for donations for our raffle and silent auction held during the dinner following the outing. [[1]](https://mountjoychamber.com/events/golf-outing/)
organization_address: 62 E Main St, Mount Joy, PA 17552
event_summary: The Annual Scholarship Golf Outing is a primary fundraiser for the Mount Joy Chamber of Commerce Scholarship Fund, which awards scholarships to local high school seniors [[1]](https://mountjoychamber.com/events/golf-outing/). The event features a four-person scramble format followed by a dinner and a silent auction [[1]](https://mountjoychamber.com/events/golf-outing/). Other major upcoming fundraisers include the Annual Chicken BBQ scheduled for August 15, 2026, and the Chocolate Walk in October [[2]](https://mountjoychamber.com/events/).

event_summary: The 2026 RPAC Auction is a fundraising event supporting the REALTOR Political Action Committee (RPAC), which advocates for candidates and policies that benefit the real estate industry and housing choices [[16]](https://rpacauction.givesmart.com/). Other upcoming events for the organization include the 88th Annual First Citizen Award Luncheon on May 5, 2026, and the Annual Charity Golf Tournament on June 8, 2026 [[2]](https://members.nwrealtor.com/events-calendar).

event_summary: The Kansas One Shot Turkey Hunt is a multi-day event scheduled for April 16-18, 2026, in El Dorado, KS, featuring a competitive hunt, community meals, and a live/silent auction [[2]](https://outdoormentors.org/kansas-one-shot-turkey-hunt) [[6]](https://www.kansasoneshotturkeyhunt.org/hunt-calendar). Key activities include a welcome dinner at the El Dorado Civic Center and the 'Strutters Banquet' where auction proceeds fund educational scholarships [[3]](https://www.kansasoneshotturkeyhunt.org/) [[6]](https://www.kansasoneshotturkeyhunt.org/hunt-calendar).

event_title: 2026 SCARC Foundation Honors Leadership Awards Gala
evidence_auction: Starting on February 18, 2026, SCARC Foundation Inc. will be auctioning off a number of fun and unique items to bid on to raise money for our organization [[17]](https://www.biddingforgood.com/scarcfoundation)
event_summary: The 2026 SCARC Foundation Honors Leadership Awards Gala is a fundraising event that honors community leaders including Patti Nugent, Eric Martino, and the Quara Family [[17]](https://www.biddingforgood.com/scarcfoundation). The event supports the SCARC Foundation's mission to provide funding for services to people with developmental disabilities and their families [[17]](https://www.biddingforgood.com/scarcfoundation). [[1]](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2026) It features a live and silent auction, with online bidding beginning on February 18, 2026 [[17]](https://www.biddingforgood.com/scarcfoundation).

event_summary: The 9th Annual Be the Change Gala is the signature fundraising event for Compassion Delivered, featuring an elegant plated dinner, live music, and both silent and live auctions [[9]](https://www.compassiondelivered.org/be-the-change-annual-gala). The event supports the organization's mission to provide high-quality, nutritional meals at no cost to people in Stark County suffering from life-threatening or terminal diseases [[2]](https://irp.cdn-website.com/63730db0/files/uploaded/2026+Sponsorship+Material.pdf). event_summary: The 34th Annual Sweetser Auction & Gala is the organization's largest fundraiser, supporting mental health treatment for Maine's most at-risk youth and families regardless of their ability to pay [[12]](https://www.sweetser.org/support/sweetser-events/auction/) [[16]](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=85kN-4u5Cuo). The event features live music, silent and live auctions, and is held at Brick South on Thompson's Point in Portland [[12]](https://www.sweetser.org/support/sweetser-events/auction/). Other upcoming events include the Sweetser/Jack Chevrolet Golf Classic on June 15, 2026 [[14]](https://www.sweetser.org/support/sweetser-events/golf-classic/).

evidence_date: The 2026 Dinner Auction will be held on Saturday, March 21, 2026, at the Ronald Reagan Presidential Library.
evidence_auction: The evening features a silent auction during the cocktail hour followed by a live auction during dinner and a paddle raise to support our students.
contact_role: Director of Events and Parent Organizations
organization_address: 31749 La Tienda Drive, Westlake Village, CA 91362
event_summary: The 2026 Dinner Auction is Oaks Christian School's premier annual fundraising gala, held at the Ronald Reagan Presidential Library to support the school's programs and student scholarships [[1]](https://www.oakschristian.org/support-ocs/events/dinner-auction). The event includes both silent and live auctions, dinner, and a paddle raise [[1]](https://www.oakschristian.org/support-ocs/events/dinner-auction). Additionally, the school is scheduled to host its annual Golf Tournament on Monday, May 11, 2026 [[2]](https://www.oakschristian.org/support-ocs/events/golf-tournament).
